ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: Europa-Kommissionen, Directorate-General for Informatics, Directorate A: Strategy & Ressources, Unit A3: ICT Procurement & Contracts

SHORT_DESCR.P: Erhvervelse af Microsoft-tjenester på avanceret niveau (proceduren DIGIT/A3/PN/2017/040).

MAIN_SITE.P: Leverings-/udførelsesstederne er de deltagende EU-institutioners lokaler eller enhver anden lokalitet inden for Den Europæiske Unions territorium.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Erhvervelse af Microsoft-tjenester på avanceret niveau (support og rådgivning).

INFO_ADD.P: Ud over Europa-Kommissionen har 66 andre institutioner, agenturer eller andre organer tilsluttet sig den endelige aftale.

D_JUSTIFICATION.P: Den angivne support og rådgivning på avanceret niveau er i sagens natur knyttet til produkterne omfattet af licensaftalen (proceduren DIGIT/A3/PN/2017/041).

INFO_ADD.P: Følgende institutioner m.v. er parter i henhold til den endelige aftale:

ACER, fællesforetagendet BBI, BEREC-kontoret, CdT, Cedefop, Chafea, fællesforetagendet Clean Sky 2, Rådet, Regionsudvalget, CPVO, EU-Domstolen, EACEA, EASA, EASME, EASO, EBA, Revisonsretten, ECB, ECHA, fællesforetagendet ECSEL, EEA, EU-Udenrigstjenesten, EØSU, EIB, EIOPA, EIT, EMA, EONN, EMSA, Ombudsmanden, Parlamentet, ERCEA, Euratoms Forsyningsagentur, ESMA, EUIPO, eu-LISA, EU-OSHA, Den Europæiske Unions Agentur for Strafferetligt Samarbejde (Eurojust), Europol, fællesforetagendet Fusion for Energy, fællesforetagendet FCH 2, Frontex, fællesforetagendet IMI 2, INEA, REA, fællesforetagendet F4E, SRB.

ADDRESS_REVIEW_INFO.OFFICIALNAME: Europa-Kommissionen, Directorat General for Informatics, Directorate A: Strategy & Ressources, Unit A3: ICT Procurement & Contracts

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: Europäische Kommission, Directorate-General for Informatics, Directorate A: Strategy & Ressources, Unit A3: ICT Procurement & Contracts

SHORT_DESCR.P: Kauf von hochwertigen Microsoft-Dienstleistungen (Verfahren DIGIT/A3/PN/2017/040).

MAIN_SITE.P: Liefer-/Erbringungsort sind die Räumlichkeiten der teilnehmenden Organe der Europäischen Union oder jeglicher anderer Ort in der Union.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Kauf von hochwertigen Microsoft-Dienstleistungen (Unterstützung und Beratung).

INFO_ADD.P: Neben der Europäischen Kommission nehmen 66 weitere Organe, Agenturen und sonstige Einrichtungen an der resultierenden Rahmenvereinbarung teil.

D_JUSTIFICATION.P: Die hochwertigen Unterstützungs- und Beratungsleistungen sind untrennbar mit den von der Lizenzvereinbarung (Verfahren DIGIT/A3/PN/2017/041) abgedeckten Produkten verbunden.

INFO_ADD.P: Die folgenden Einrichtungen usw. sind Parteien der resultierenden Rahmenvereinbarung:

ACER, Gemeinsames Unternehmen BBI, GEREK, CDT, Cedefop, Cepol, Chafea, Gemeinsames Unternehmen Clean Sky 2, Rat, CdR, CPCC, CPVO, EuGH, ECDC, EACEA, EASA, EASME, EASO, EBA, Europäischer Rechnungshof, EZB, ECDC, ECHA, Gemeinsames Unternehmen ECSEL, EVA, EDSB, EUA, EAD, EWSA, EFCA, EFSA, EIB, EIF, EIGE, EIOPA, EIT, EMA, EBDD, EMSA, ENISA, Bürgerbeauftragter, EP, EPPO, ERA, ERCEA, ESA, ESMA, ETF, EUIPO, EUISS, eu-LISA, EU-OSHA, Eurofound, Eurojust, Europol, Gemeinsames Unternehmen Fusion for Energy, Gemeinsames Unternehmen FCH 2, FRA, Frontex, GSA, Gemeinsames Unternehmen IMI 2, INEA, REA, Gemeinsames Unternehmen S2R, SATCEN, SESAR2, SRB.

ADDRESS_REVIEW_INFO.OFFICIALNAME: Europäische Kommission, Directorate General for Informatics, Directorate A: Strategy & Ressources, Unit A3: ICT Procurement & Contracts

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: European Commission, Directorate General for Informatics, Directorate A: Strategy & Resources, Unit A3: ICT Procurement & Contracts

SHORT_DESCR.P: Acquisition of high-level Microsoft services (procedure DIGIT/A3/PN/2017/040).

MAIN_SITE.P: The places of delivery/performance are the premises of the participating EUIs, or any other location in theterritory of the Union.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Acquisition of high-level Microsoft services (support and consultancy).

INFO_ADD.P: Apart from the European Commission, 66 other institutions, agencies or other bodies joined the resulting agreement.

D_JUSTIFICATION.P: The high-level support and consultancy services are intrinsically linked to the products covered by the License Agreement (procedure DIGIT/A3/PN/2017/041).

INFO_ADD.P: The following institutions, etc. are parties under the resulting agreement:

ACER, BBI Joint Undertaking, BEREC, CDT, Cedefop, Cepol, Chafea, Clean Sky 2 Joint Undertaking, Council, CoR, CPCC, CPVO, CJEU, EACEA, EASA, EASME, EASO, EBA, ECA, ECB, ECDC, ECHA, ECSEL Joint Undertaking, EDA, EDPS, EEA,EEAS, EESC, EFCA, EFSA, EIB, EIF, EIGE, EIOPA, EIT, EMA, EMCDDA, EMSA, ENISA, Ombudsman, EP, EPPO, ERA, ERCEA, ESA, ESMA, ETF, EUIPO, EUISS, eu-LISA, EU-OSHA, Eurofound, Eurojust, Europol, F4E Joint Undertaking, FCH 2 Joint Undertaking, FRA, Frontex, GSA, IMI 2Joint Undertaking, INEA, REA, S2R Joint Undertaking, SATCEN, SESAR2, SRB.

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: Comisión Europea, Directorate General for Informatics, Directorate A: Strategy & Resources, Unit A3: ICT Procurement & Contracts

SHORT_DESCR.P: Adquisición de servicios de Microsoft de alto nivel (procedimiento DIGIT/A3/PN/2017/040).

MAIN_SITE.P: El lugar de entrega/ejecución son las instalaciones de las instituciones participantes de la Unión Europea o cualquier otro lugar dentro del territorio de la UE.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Adquisición de servicios de Microsoft de alto nivel (asistencia y consultoría).

OBJECT_DESCR.EU_PROGR_RELATED: créditos administrativos de la Unión Europea

INFO_ADD.P: Junto a la Comisión Europea, participan del contrato resultante, otras 66 instituciones, agencias y otros organismos.

D_JUSTIFICATION.P: Los servicios de asistencia y consultoría de alto nivel están intrínsecamente vinculados con los productos cubiertos por el contrato de licencia (procedimiento DIGIT/A3/PN/2017/041).

INFO_ADD.P: Se detallan a continuación todas las partes (instituciones, organismos, empresas, etc) del contrato resultante:

ACER, Empresa Común BBI, ORECE, CDT, Cedefop, Cepol, Chafea, Empresa Común Clean Sky 2, Consejo, CDR, CPCC, OCVV, Tribunal de Justicia de la Unión Europea, EACEA, AESA, EASME, EASO, ABE, Tribunal de Cuentas Europeo, BCE, ECDC, ECHA, Empresa Común ECSEL, AED, SEPD, AEMA, SEAE, CESE, AECP, EFSA, BEI, FEI, EIGE, AESPJ, EIT, EMA, OEDT, AESM, ENISA, Defensor del Pueblo, Parlamento Europeo, OEPP, EEI, ERCEA, AEE, AEVM, ETF, EUIPO, IESUE, eu-LISA, EU-OSHA, Eurofund, Eurojust, Europol, Empresa Común F4E, Empresa Común FCH 2, FRA, Frontex, GSA, Empresa Común IMI 2, Empresa Común S2R, INEA, REA, Empresa Común S2R, SATCEN, SESAR2, JUR.

ADDRESS_REVIEW_INFO.OFFICIALNAME: Comisión Europea, Directorate General for Informatics, Directorate A: Strategy & Resources, Unit A3: ICT Procurement & Contracts

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: Euroopan komissio, Directorate General for Informatics, Directorate A: Strategy & Resources, Unit A3: ICT Procurement & Contracts

SHORT_DESCR.P: Sopimuksen kohteena on korkean tason Microsoft-palvelujen hankinta (menettely DIGIT/A3/PN/2017/040).

MAIN_SITE.P: Toimitus-/suorituspaikkoja ovat osallistuvien EU:n toimielinten toimitilat sekä mikä tahansa muu paikka EU:n alueella.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Sopimuksen kohteena on korkean tason Microsoft-palvelujen hankinta (tuki ja konsultointi).

INFO_ADD.P: Euroopan komission lisäksi 66 muuta toimielintä, virastoa tai muuta elintä osallistuivat tehtävään sopimukseen.

D_JUSTIFICATION.P: korkean tason tuki- ja konsultointipalvelut liittyvät olennaisesti lisenssisopimuksen kohteena oleviin tuotteisiin (menettely DIGIT/A3/PN/2017/041).

INFO_ADD.P: Seuraavat toimielimet jne. ovat tehtävän sopimuksen osapuolia:

ACER, BBI-yhteisyritys, BEREC, CDT, Cedefop, Cepol, Chafea, Clean Sky 2 -yhteisyritys, neuvosto, AK, CPCC, CPVO, Euroopan unionin tuomioistuin (Court of Justice of the European Union – CJEU, EACEA, EASA, EASME, EASO, EPV, ETT, EKP, ECDC, ECHA, ECSEL-yhteisyritys, EDA, EDPS, EEA, EUHS, ETSK, EFCA, EFSA, EIP, EIR, EIGE, EIOPA, EIT, EMA, EMCDDA, EMSA, ENISA, oikeusasiamies, EP, EPPO, ERA, ERCEA, ESA, ESMA, ETF, EUIPO, EUTT, eu-LISA, EU-OSHA, Eurofound, Eurojust, Europol, Fusion for Energy -yhteisyritys, FCH 2 -yhteisyritys, FRA, Frontex, GSA, IMI 2 -yhteisyritys, INEA, REA, S2R-yhteisyritys, EUSK, SESAR 2 -yhteisyritys, SRB.

ADDRESS_REVIEW_INFO.OFFICIALNAME: Euroopan komissio, Directorate General for Informatics, Directorate A: Strategy & Resources, Unit A3: ICT Procurement & Contracts

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: Commission européenne, Directorate General for Informatics, Directorate A: Strategy & Ressources, Unit A3 : ICT Procurement & Contracts

SHORT_DESCR.P: Acquisition de services Microsoft de haut niveau (procédure DIGIT/A3/PN/2017/040).

MAIN_SITE.P: Les lieux de livraison/de performance sont les locaux des IUE participant, ou n’importe quelle autre lieu sur le territoire de l’Union.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Acquisition de services Microsoft de haut niveau (soutien et consultation).

INFO_ADD.P: Outre la Commission européenne, 66 autres institutions, agences ou autres organismes participent conjointement au contrat-cadre résultant de la procédure.

D_JUSTIFICATION.P: Le soutien et la consultation de haut niveau sont intrinsèquement liés aux produits couverts par le contrat de licence (procédure DIGIT/A3/PN/2017/041).

INFO_ADD.P: Les institutions suivantes, etc. sont parties dans le cadre du contrat-cadre résultant de la présente procédure :

ACER, entreprise commune Bio-industries, Office de l'ORECE, CdT, Cedefop, Chafea, entreprise commune Clean Sky 2, Conseil, CdR, OCVV, CJUE, EACEA, AESA, EASME, EASO, ABE, Cour des comptes européenne, BCE, ECHA, entreprise commune ECSEL, AEE, SEAE, CESE, AECP, EFSA, BEI, AEAPP, EIT, EMA, OEDT, AESM, Médiateur, PE, ERCEA, Agence d'approvisionnement d'Euratom, AEMF, OUEPI, eu-LISA, EU-OSHA, Eurofound, Agence de l'Union européenne pour la coopération judiciaire en matière pénale (Eurojust), Europol, entreprise commune Fusion for Energy, entreprise commune PCH 2, Frontex, entreprise commune IMI 2, INEA, REA, entreprise commune S2R, CSUE, SESAR2, CRU.

ADDRESS_REVIEW_INFO.OFFICIALNAME: Commission européenne, Directorate General for Informatics, Directorate A: Strategy & Ressources, Unit A3 : ICT Procurement & Contracts

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: Ευρωπαϊκή Επιτροπή, Directorate General for Informatics, Directorate A: Strategy & Ressources, Unit A3: ICT Procurement & Contracts

SHORT_DESCR.P: Απόκτηση υπηρεσιών υψηλού επιπέδου της Microsoft (διαδικασία DIGIT/A3/PN/2017/040).

MAIN_SITE.P: Οι τόποι παράδοσης/εκτέλεσης είναι οι εγκαταστάσεις των ευρωπαϊκών κέντρων τεκμηρίωσης (EUIs), ή οποιαδήποτε τοποθεσία στην επικράτεια της ΕΕ.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Απόκτηση υπηρεσιών υψηλού επιπέδου της Microsoft (υποστήριξη και συμβουλευτική).

INFO_ADD.P: Εκτός από την Ευρωπαϊκή Επιτροπή, άλλα 66 θεσμικά και λοιπά όργανα και οργανισμοί συμμετείχαν στη σύμβαση που προέκυψε.

D_JUSTIFICATION.P: Οι υψηλού επιπέδου υπηρεσίες υποστήριξης και οι συμβουλευτικές υπηρεσίες είναι άρρηκτα συνδεδεμένες με τα προϊόντα που καλύπτονται από τη Συμφωνία Αδειοδότησης (διαδικασία DIGIT/A3/PN/2017/041).

INFO_ADD.P: Τα ακόλουθα θεσμικά όργανα, κ.λπ. αποτελούν συμβαλλόμενα μέρη της προκύπτουσας σύμβασης:

ACER, BBI Κοινή Επιχείρηση, BEREC, CDT, Cedefop, Cepol, Chafea, Clean Sky 2 Κοινή Επιχείρηση, Council, CoR, CPCC, CPVO, CJEU, EACEA, EASA, EASME, EASO, EBA, ECA, ECB, ECDC, ECHA, ECSEL Κοινή επιχείρηση, EDA, EDPS, EEA,EEAS, EESC, EFCA, EFSA, EIB, EIF, EIGE, EIOPA, EIT, EMA, EMCDDA, EMSA, ENISA, Ombudsman, EP, EPPO, ERA, ERCEA, ESA, ESMA, ETF, EUIPO, EUISS, eu-LISA, EU-OSHA, Eurofound, Eurojust, Europol, F4E Κοινή επιχείρηση, FCH 2 Κοινή Επιχείρηση, FRA, Frontex, GSA, IMI 2 Κοινή Επιχείρηση, INEA, REA, S2R Κοινή Επιχείρηση, SATCEN, SESAR2, SRB.

ADDRESS_REVIEW_INFO.OFFICIALNAME: Ευρωπαϊκή Επιτροπή, Directorate General for Informatics, Directorate A: Strategy & Ressources, Unit A3: ICT Procurement & Contracts

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: Commissione europea, Directorate General for Informatics, Directorate A: Strategy & Ressources, Unit A3: ICT Procurement & Contracts

SHORT_DESCR.P: Acquisizione di servizi Microsoft di alto livello (procedura DIGIT/A3/PN/2017/040).

MAIN_SITE.P: I luoghi di fornitura/esecuzione saranno le sedi delle istituzioni dell’UE partecipanti, o qualsiasi altra località nel territorio dell’Unione.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Acquisizione di servizi Microsoft di alto livello (supporto e consulenza).

INFO_ADD.P: Oltre alla Commissione europea, altre 66 istituzioni, agenzie o altri organismi hanno aderito all’accordo risultante.

D_JUSTIFICATION.P: I servizi di supporto e consulenza ad alto livello sono intrinsecamente vincolati ai prodotti coperti dall’accordo di licenza (procedura DIGIT/A3/PN/2017/041).

INFO_ADD.P: Le seguenti istituzioni ecc. fanno parte del contratto quadro risultante:

ACER, IC BBI, BEREC, CDT, Cedefop, Cepol, Chafea, IC Clean Sky 2, Consiglio, CdR, CPCC, UCVV, CGUE, EACEA, EASME, EASO, EBA, CCE, BCE, ECHA, IC ECSEL, AED, GEPD, AEA, SEAE, CESE, EFCA, EFSA, BEI, FEI, EIGE, EIOPA, EIT, EMA, EMCDDA, EMSA, ENISA, Mediatore, PE, EPPO, SER, ERCEA, ESA, ESMA, ETF, EUIPO, EUISS, eu-LISA, EU-OSHA, Eurofound, Eurojust, Europol, IC F4E, FRA, Frontex, GSA, IC IMI 2, INEA, REA, IC S2R, SATCEN, SESAR2, SRB.

ADDRESS_REVIEW_INFO.OFFICIALNAME: Commissione europea, Directorate General for Informatics, Directorate A: Strategy & Ressources, Unit A3: ICT Procurement & Contracts

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: Europese Commissie, Directorate-General for Informatics, Directorate A: Strategy & Ressources, Unit A3: ICT Procurement & Contracts

SHORT_DESCR.P: Verwerving van Microsoftdiensten van hoog niveau (procedure DIGIT/A3/PN/2017/040).

MAIN_SITE.P: de plaatsen van levering/uitvoering zijn de kantoren van de deelnemende EU-instellingen of elke andere locatie op het grondgebied van de EU.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Verwerving van Microsoftdiensten van hoog niveau (ondersteuning en advies).

INFO_ADD.P: Naast de Europese Commissie nemen 66 andere instellingen, agentschappen of andere organen deel aan de resulterende raamovereenkomst.

D_JUSTIFICATION.P: De ondersteunings- en adviesdiensten op hoog niveau zijn onlosmakelijk verbonden met de producten die onder de licentieovereenkomst vallen (procedure DIGIT/A3/PN/2017/041).

INFO_ADD.P: De volgende instellingen, enz. zijn partij bij de resulterende raamovereenkomst:

ACER, Gemeenschappelijke Onderneming BBI, BEREC, CDT, Cedefop, Cepol, Chafea, Gemeenschappelijke Onderneming Clean Sky 2, Raad, CvdR, CPCC, CPVO, HvJ, EACEA, EASA, Easme, EASO, EBA, ECA, ECB, ECDC, ECHA, Gemeenschappelijke Onderneming Ecsel, EDA, EDPS, EEA, EDEO, EESC, EFCA, EFSA, EIB, EIF, EIGE, Eiopa, EIT, EMA, EWDD, EMSA, Enisa, Ombudsman, EP, EPPO, ESB, ERCEA, Voorzieningsagentschap van Euratom, ESMA, ETF, EUIPO, IVSEU, eu-LISA, EU-OSHA, Eurofound, Eurojust, Europol, Gemeenschappelijke Onderneming Fusion for Energy, Gemeenschappelijke Onderneming FCH 2, FRA, Frontex, GSA, Gemeenschappelijke Onderneming IMI 2, INEA, REA, Gemeenschappelijke Onderneming S2R, SatCen, Sesar2, GAR.

ADDRESS_REVIEW_INFO.OFFICIALNAME: Europese Commissie, Directorate-General for Informatics, Directorate A: Strategy & Ressources, Unit A3: ICT Procurement & Contracts

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: Comissão Europeia, Directorate General for Informatics, Directorate A: Strategy & Ressources, Unit A3: ICT Procurement & Contracts

SHORT_DESCR.P: Aquisição de serviços Microsoft de alto nível (procedimento DIGIT/A3/PN/2017/040).

MAIN_SITE.P: Os locais de entrega/desempenho são as instalações das instituições da UE participantes, ou qualquer outro local no território da União.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Aquisição de serviços Microsoft de alto nível (apoio e consultoria).

INFO_ADD.P: Para além da Comissão Europeia, 66 outras instituições, agências ou outros organismos aderiram ao acordo resultante.

D_JUSTIFICATION.P: Os serviços de apoio e consultoria de alto nível estão intrinsecamente ligados aos produtos abrangidos pelo acordo de licença (procedimento DIGIT/A3/PN/2017/041).

INFO_ADD.P: As seguintes instituições, etc. são partes no âmbito do acordo resultante:

ACER, Empresa Comum BBI, ORECE, CDT, Cedefop, Cepol Chafea, Empresa Comum Clean Sky 2, Conselho, CR, CPCC, ICVV, TJUE, EACEA, AESA, EASME, EASO, EBA, TCE, BCE, ECDC, ECHA, Empresa Comum ECSEL, EDA, EDPS, AEA, SEAE, CESE, AECP, EFSA, BEI, EIF, EIGE, EIOPA, EIT, EMA, OEDT, EMSA, ENISA, Provedor de Justiça Europeu, PE, EPPO, ERA, ERCEA, ESA, ESMA, ETF, EUIPO, EUISS, eu-LISA, EU-OSHA, Eurofound, Agência Europeia para a Cooperação Judiciária Penal (Eurojust), Europol, Empresa Comum F4E, Empresa Comum PCH 2, FRA, Frontex, GSA, Empresa Comum IMI 2, INEA, REA, Empresa Comum S2R, SATCEN, SESAR2, CUR.

ADDRESS_REVIEW_INFO.OFFICIALNAME: Comissão Europeia, Directorate General for Informatics, Directorate A: Strategy & Ressources, Unit A3: ICT Procurement & Contracts

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: Europeiska kommissionen, Directorate General for Informatics, Directorate A: Strategy & Ressources, Unit A3: ICT Procurement & Contracts

SHORT_DESCR.P: Anskaffning av avancerade Microsoft-tjänster (förfarande DIGIT/A3/PN/2017/040).

MAIN_SITE.P: Platserna för leverans/utförande är de deltagande EUI-ländernas lokaler, eller någon annan plats inom unionens territorium.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Anskaffning av avancerade Microsoft-tjänster (stöd och rådgivningsverksamhet).

INFO_ADD.P: Förutom Europeiska kommissionen har 66 andra institutioner, byråer eller andra organ anslutit sig till det resulterande avtalet.

D_JUSTIFICATION.P: De avancerade stöd- och rådgivningstjänsterna är i grunden kopplade till de produkter, som omfattas av licensavtalet (förfarande DIGIT/A3/PN/2017/041).

INFO_ADD.P: Följande institutioner etc. är parter inom ramen för det resulterande ramavtalet:

Acer, gemensamma företaget BBI, Berec-byrån, CdT, Cedefop, Cepol, Chafea, gemensamma företaget Clean Sky 2, ReK, CPCC, CPVO, Europeiska unionens domstol, Eacea, Easa, Easme, Easo, EBA, Europeiska revisionsrätten, ECB, ECDC, Echa, gemensamma företaget Ecsel, EDA, EDPS, EEA, EESK, EFCA, Efsa, EIB, EIF, EIGE, Eiopa, EIT, EMA, EMCDDA, Emsa, Enisa, Europeiska ombudsmannen, Europaparlamentet, Eppo, ERA, Ercea, ESA, Esma, ETF, EUIPO, EUISS, eu-LISA, EU-Osha, Eurofound, Eurojust, Europol, det europeiska gemensamma företaget för ITER och utveckling av fusionsenergi, gemensamma företaget FCH 2, FRA, Frontex, GSA, IMI, Inea, REA, gemensamma företaget Shift2Rail, Satcen, Sesar2, och SRB.

MAIN_SITE.P: Местата на доставка/изпълнение са помещенията на участващите институции на ЕС или всяко друго местоположение на територията на Съюза.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Придобиване на Услуги на високо ниво на Microsoft (подкрепа и консултации).

OBJECT_DESCR.EU_PROGR_RELATED: Бюджетни кредити за административни разходи на ЕС

INFO_ADD.P: Освен Европейската комисия, 66 други институции, агенции и органи са включени в произтичащото споразумение.

D_JUSTIFICATION.P: Услугите по подкрепа и консултации на високо ниво са неразривно свързани с продуктите, включени в Лицензионния договор (процедура DIGIT/A3/PN/2017/041).

INFO_ADD.P: По произтичащото споразумение страни са следните институции и др.:

ACER, Съвместно предприятие БП, Служба на ОЕРЕС, CdT, Cedefop, Chafea, Съвместно предприятие „Чисто небе 2“, Съвет, CoR, CPVO, CJEU, EACEA, ЕААБ, EASME, EASO, ЕБО, ECA, ЕЦБ, ECHA, Съвместно предприятие ECSEL, ЕАОС, ЕСВД, ЕИСК, EFCA, ЕОБХ, ЕИБ, EIOPA, EIT, EMA, ЕЦМНН, ЕАМБ, Омбудсман, ЕП, ERCEA, Агенция за снабдяване към Евратом, ESMA, EUIPO, eu-LISA, EU-OSHA, Eurofound, Агенцията на Европейския съюз за сътрудничество в областта на наказателното правосъдие (Евроюст), Европол, Съвместно предприятие „Fusion for Energy“, Съвместно предприятие ГКВ 2, Frontex, Съвместно предприятие на ИИЛ 2, INEA, REA, Съвместно предприятие F4E, ЕСП.

ADDRESS_REVIEW_INFO.OFFICIALNAME: Европейска комисия, Directorate General for Informatics, Directorate A: Strategy & Resources, Unit A3: ICT Procurement & Contracts

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: Comisia Europeană, Directorate General for Informatics, Directorate A: Strategy & Resources, Unit A3: ICT Procurement & Contracts

SHORT_DESCR.P: Achiziționarea de servicii Microsoft la nivel înalt (procedura DIGIT/A3/PN/2017/040).

MAIN_SITE.P: Locurile de livrare/prestare sunt sediile Institutelor Universitare Europene participante sau orice altă locație pe teritoriul Uniunii.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Achiziționarea de servicii Microsoft la nivel înalt (asistență și consultanță).

INFO_ADD.P: În plus față de Comisia Europeană, alte 66 de instituții, agenții sau alte organisme s-au alăturat acordului rezultat.

D_JUSTIFICATION.P: Serviciile de asistență și consultanță la nivel înalt sunt intrinsec legate de produsele care fac obiectul acordului de licențiere (procedura DIGIT/A3/PN/2017/041).

INFO_ADD.P: Următoarele instituții etc. sunt părți ale acordului rezultat:

ACER, Întreprinderea comună pentru bioindustrii, OAREC, CDT, Cedefop, Cepol, Chafea, Întreprinderea comună Clean Sky 2, Consiliul, CoR, CPCC, OCSP, CJUE, EACEA, AESA, EASME, EASO, ABE, CEC, BCE, ECDC, ECHA, Întreprinderea comună ECSEL, AEA, AEPD, SEE, SEAE, CESE, AECP, EFSA, BEI, FEI, EIGE, EIOPA, EIT, EMA, EMCDDA, EMSA, ENISA, Ombudsmanul, PE, OEMPP, ERA, ERCEA, ESA, ESMA, ETF, EUIPO, EUISS, eu-LISA, EU-OSHA, Eurofound, Eurojust, Europol, Întreprinderea comună Fusion for Energy, Întreprinderea comună FCH 2, FRA, Frontex, GSA, Întreprinderea comună IMI 2, INEA, REA, Întreprinderea comună S2R, SATCEN, SESAR2, SRB.

ADDRESS_REVIEW_INFO.OFFICIALNAME: Comisia Europeană, Directorate General for Informatics, Directorate A: Strategy & Resources, Unit A3: ICT Procurement & Contracts

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: Europska komisija, Directorate General for Informatics, Directorate A: Strategy & Ressources, Unit A3: ICT Procurement & Contracts

SHORT_DESCR.P: Nabava Microsoftovih usluga na visokoj razini (postupak DIGIT/A3/PN/2017/040).

MAIN_SITE.P: Mjesta isporuke/izvedbe prostori su sudjelujućih institucija Europske unije ili bilo koja druga lokacija na teritoriju Unije.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Nabava Microsoftovih usluga na visokoj razini (podrška i savjetovanje).

INFO_ADD.P: Osim Europske komisije 66 ostalih institucija, agencija ili drugih tijela pridružilo se sporazumu koji je rezultat ovog postupka.

D_JUSTIFICATION.P: Usluge podrške i savjetovanja na visokoj razini suštinski su povezane s proizvodima obuhvaćenim sporazumom o licenciranju (postupak DIGIT/A3/PN/2017/041).

INFO_ADD.P: Sljedeće institucije itd. strane su sporazuma koji proizlazi iz ovog postupka:

ACER, Zajedničko poduzeće za bioindustriju BBI, Ured BEREC-a, CdT, Cedefop, CEPOL, Chafea, Zajedničko poduzeće Clean Sky 2, Vijeće, OR, CPCC, CPVO, Sud Europske unije, EACEA, EASA, Izvršna agencija za mala i srednja poduzeća EASME, EASO, EBA, ECA, ESB, ECDC, ECHA, Zajedničko poduzeće ECSEL, EDA, EDPS, EEA, ESVD, EGSO, EFCA, EFSA, EIB, EIF, EIGE, EIOPA, EIT, EMA, EMCDDA, EMSA, ENISA, Ombudsman, EP, EPPO, ERA, ERCEA, ESA, ESMA, ETF, EUIPO, EUISS, eu-LISA, EU-OSHA, Eurofound, Eurojust, Europol, Zajedničko poduzeće „Fuzija za energiju” F4E, Zajedničko poduzeće FCH 2, FRA, Frontex, Agencija za europski GNSS, Zajedničko poduzeće IMI 2, INEA, REA, Zajedničko poduzeće S2R, Satcen, SESAR 2, SRB.
